meta.name: Google Calendar automated notifications with email, SMS & analytics dashboard

nodes.name: Send Email - Mailchimp Transactional
nodes.notes: Note: For Mailchimp Transactional (Mandrill), you may need to use HTTP Request node instead

nodes.name: Check Every 5 Minutes1
nodes.notes: Checks every 5 minutes to catch events that need 15-min reminders

value.SMS Runs:
==COUNTIFS(
  'Execution Log'!G:G, ">=" & INDEX(A:A, ROW()),
  'Execution Log'!G:G, "<" & INDEX(A:A, ROW()) + 1,
  'Execution Log'!B:B, "*SMS*"
)
value.Email Runs:
==COUNTIFS(
  'Execution Log'!G:G, ">=" & INDEX(A:A, ROW()),
  'Execution Log'!G:G, "<" & INDEX(A:A, ROW()) + 1,
  'Execution Log'!B:B, "*Email*"
)
value.Weekly Runs:
==COUNTIFS(
  'Execution Log'!G:G, ">=" & INDEX(A:A, ROW()),
  'Execution Log'!G:G, "<" & INDEX(A:A, ROW()) + 1,
  'Execution Log'!B:B, "*Weekly*"
)
value.Total Events: ==SUMIFS('Execution Log'!E4:E,'Execution Log'!G4:G,">="& INDEX(A:A, ROW()),'Execution Log'!G4:G,"<"& INDEX(A:A, ROW())+1)
value.Reminder Runs:
==COUNTIFS(
  'Execution Log'!G:G, ">=" & INDEX(A:A, ROW()),
  'Execution Log'!G:G, "<" & INDEX(A:A, ROW()) + 1,
  'Execution Log'!B:B, "*Reminder*"
)

==COUNTIFS(

  'Execution Log'!G:G, "<" & INDEX(A:A, ROW()) + 1,
  'Execution Log'!B:B, "*SMS*"
)

==COUNTIFS(

parameters.content:
## Auto Calendar Notifications and Real-Time Reporting with n8n and App Script

## How it works
- **Schedule Trigger** is to set a trigger on the precise time to run
- **Google Calendar node** to read through your events and output calendar events
- **The Code nodes** are used to filter, merge, and format data to be used in the workflow
- Can use **MailChimp** or **SendGrid** to send email to the team
- **Twillo node** is used to send sms reminders to the team
- **Google Sheet** is used to append and update data to deliver efficient reporting - report webpage attached below

## Setup
1. Get the **3-sheet** Google Sheet template below 
2. Get the **App Script** code below. Click extension, go to App script, paste code and authorize as web. Copy and paste the generated WebHook URL in the reporting webpage WebHook section
3. Get the WebPage below and edit the WebHook
4. Set up **[Twillo](https://console.twilio.com/)** and add credential. Free $15 to test
5. Set up **[Google Cloud](https://console.cloud.google.com/)** and enable **Google Calendar**. Add in credentials
6. Set up SendGrid or MailChimp, depending on platform use.


## [Get 3-sheet G/Sheet template](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1S91eS0LV51DZ_9KkA20tfns27umyOU5V/edit?usp=drive_link&ouid=113513617635127854147&rtpof=true&sd=true)
## [Get App Script Code](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1iamkTByQ00aNVsjkr7Nfz1mtn9_b03g9/view?usp=drive_link)
## [Get the Report WebPage site](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1R0-v8nMEOjYDkaodhsFxo-eTXIByE6fP/view?usp=sharing)
## Can work with MailChimp by replacing with SendGrid - Standard plan or higher
